Name: Hawaiian
Ingredients: 15 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
30 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)
Instructions: BLEND all ingredients with two 12oz scoops crushed ice and serve with straws.
Review: Coconut, rum and fruit juice. Aloha.
Nutrition: One serving of Hawaiian contains 354 calories
